name: The Impossible Game Challenge
description:
The most challenges game is coming now!

It is total 99 levels in the game waiting for challenge.

The game is full of challenging,99 levels will definitely make you crazy soon.

The are many barriers in the game, you not only need to avoid them, but also need to jump/overturn to avoid them in the right time while the barriers are moving. So that it requires flexible fingers.

You need switches to make the barriers move, and you need to make use of the tollgate to avoid to be struck by the barriers.

Challange yourself, you could show your strength to your friends after you rushing across the mutated 99 levels.

Let's go join us, quickly!Download the game! right now!
